img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 68.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/de/Wukong_Pagoda_68.jpg)
After you defeat the lone archer guarding the ramp up out of the prison, you may notice any current curse applied to you will dissipate the moment you reach the top! You can celebrate this breath of fresh air, just be wary of a Frozen Corpse waiting to try and attack you as you cross the last wooden beam.
img_below_text:
To the left, you can find the Mani Wheel Shrine and a path to the boss, but there's one last section of the fourth level of the prison we need to complete, which unfortunately means going back to the madness. Be sure to unlock the Shrine regardless so you can teleport back to it easily.
Take the path going right from the wooden beams, and you'll come upon a group of frozen corpses by a raised platform. They'll be smashed to pieces as a new enemy flies down -- a Falcon Fan-Maker.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 68.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/de/Wukong_Pagoda_68.jpg)
After you defeat the lone archer guarding the ramp up out of the prison, you may notice any current curse applied to you will dissipate the moment you reach the top! You can celebrate this breath of fresh air, just be wary of a Frozen Corpse waiting to try and attack you as you cross the last wooden beam."
        - Following Text: "To the left, you can find the Mani Wheel Shrine and a path to the boss, but there's one last section of the fourth level of the prison we need to complete, which unfortunately means going back to the madness. Be sure to unlock the Shrine regardless so you can teleport back to it easily.
Take the path going right from the wooden beams, and you'll come upon a group of frozen corpses by a raised platform. They'll be smashed to pieces as a new enemy flies down -- a Falcon Fan-Maker."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character standing on a snowy ledge overlooking a precarious wooden beam bridge leading to another platform. The character wields a glowing staff, suggesting readiness for combat or exploration. This area appears to be part of the prison level, where the player has just escaped a curse and is navigating towards new challenges, including frozen corpses and an upcoming enemy encounter.
